dialogue.content: Since I started using the wheelchair, I can't reach the thermostat anymore.
That must be frustrating during these cold winter months.
It is. I have to wait for my son to come over to change the heat.
A smart thermostat you can control from your phone would give you that independence back.
I'm not great with apps, but I can use my iPad for basic things.
We can set up a very simple interface on your iPad with just 'Warmer' and 'Cooler'.
Controlling the heat from my iPad would mean I don't have to wait for my son.
